name: Thoughtsofhope
0:
”Alexa, open thoughts of hope”
”Alexa, ask thoughts of hope to compliment me”
”Alexa, ask thoughts of hope for a compliment”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: thoughts of hope
des:
Ask Alexa to compliment your favorite people (or even yourself!) and she will choose from a list of compliments.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
